p: A total of 457 nasopharygeal swab specimens were collected from adults with ILI (upper respiratory symptoms and/or fever) at the outpatient department of Keiyu Hospital, Yokohama, Japan, in the 2018/2019 influenza season (December 2018 to March 2019). The study protocol was approved by the ethics committee of Keiyu Hospital (No.H27-24 in 2017). All subjects provided their informed consent to participate in our study. Nasopharyngeal swab specimens were tested with an ImunoAce Flu test kit.
